attributes.title: Horrible app.
attributes.review: This app crashed my phone, made my Snapchat incredibly slow, made me want to LEAVE THE COUNTRY because awareness of what our president is really doing was brought to my attention. This app is horrible. If I could rate this app & the president with negative stars, I would. DO NOT GET.

attributes.title: Please don’t waste your time
attributes.review: the app kept glitching and it wouldn’t even let me put in my phone number to join!  when i finally got in the app kept crashing and even permanently logged me out!! do not download very bad

attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY AWFUL
attributes.review: I got this hoping to look into the campaign of this orange president and was disappointed to see it took A MONTH to download and then EVERY. SINGLE. TIME. I opened it it would shut off my phone and delete all of my memory. Gotta say, I’m very disappointed 0/10.

attributes.title: Worst app listen !
attributes.review: This man is a billionaire and his clothes on this app is just low quality and ugly just shows how much he does not care for his supporters. I did order one item and it smelled weird kinda of like cheese pls save your money and spend it somewhere else!!

attributes.title: CHEETO
attributes.review: Can you believe how bad this app is it took about two weeks to download, and when I got on the app there was a Cheeto looking person it scared me so much I had to go to therapy after. Like really now I’m TRAUMATIZED because this app showed me a terrible picture of a terrible person, THAT CHEETO IS GONNA PAY MY THERAPY BILLS

attributes.title: This app is garbage
attributes.review: I was testing it out when it just started opening and closing and giving me messages like “I’m going to eat your beans” and “we’re going to stab your children” and then it deleted itself from my phone

attributes.title: Needs Work
attributes.review: It keeps on buffering and won’t work the way I thought it could of helped me, I just don’t get why this app was such a fail for me. Hope they make some changes or take it down overall.

attributes.title: Dump trump
attributes.review: This app is the worst I don’t even know why I downloaded it oh wait yes i do I only download it because I just wanted to rate it and also because I wanted to tell you that tik tok didn’t have nothing to do with your election so stop trying to delete it 🤬

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: This app took weeks to download! Once it was finally finished it used up all my phone battery in the first 5 min of using the app. It makes your phone glitch and makes all your other apps slow, DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!

attributes.title: Worst app ever 💩🤮🤡🧚‍♂️
attributes.review: I can’t believe this app is still on the App Store 🙈 At first it looked like a normal campaign. However the first thing that I saw when opening the app was a lumpy spray tanned orange standing nude in the middle of my phone. Super inappropriate this app needs to be STOPPED 👁👄👁Will Never Download again 🤮
